headline: Figma’s Auction-Like IPO Set Up to Capitalize on Strong Demand

headline: NXP Semiconductors Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Fall Y/Y
summary: NXPI posts Q2 revenues of $2.93B, down 6% Y/Y, while EPS of $2.72 surpasses the consensus mark by 2%.

headline: Figma aims for $16 billion valuation as IPO date and stock listing nears
summary: The design software startup said it plans to offer shares on the New York Stock Exchange priced between $25 and $28 each.
